title: Update build documentation
description: Clarify build instructions in README.md based on the verified build process.

title: Solve message play in production issue
description:
When building the vibe cast app in production, triggering messages does not show. It works well in development mode.

This is quite likely because of the difference in how the visualization window is opened in production, where it is re-started in order to make a fix for youtbue playback. Note, youtbue playback should still be working without error 153 in production builds

As a part of this work, a comprehensive testing strategy needs to be developed, so it is possible to test without a human in the loop.

title: Test messages in production
description: There needs to be a way to automatically test is messages are shown for the production build of the app

title: Debug information for production
description: When running in production mode, it should be possible to get debug information. The current overlay (cmd+shift+d) does not show up. This might be the same issue as the messages now showing

title: Make sure messages show in production
description: Messages should show in production when triggered. Currently they only show as playing but nothing happens.

title: Performance improvements for visualizers
description: When running particles, about 30% CPU is used. IS this really needed? Similarly, there has been some indications that Fireplace might leak resources. In general, it is important to keep the visualizaations as lean as possible, while still keeping everything high-fps and stutter-free.

title: Attemt improving compilation speed of tauri app
description: The current tauri-app takes a long time to compile for the Rust part, which might either be due to actual Tauri issues, or because the vibe_cast crate is too large. Faster compilation could perhaps be achieved by splitting up the vibe_cast crate into multiple crates if possible. It is only worth it to do if the quality of the code is not negatively affected.

title: Better testing of flows
description: A system-test is needed that will run through a good portion of the features end-to-end is needed as a final verification step. This needs a lot of support, from instructing the control plane, running the remote, checking the visualization window for effects, and so on. This would be used for releases, and for verification of larger work to make sure the program still works as intended

title: Clean up presets
description: The default presets should include standard fireplace, blue glow fireplace (fireplace without logs, embers, or flames, and a calm blue base), a slideshow with some example images, particles but with slightly larger and slower particles, the current youtube preset, the techno preset without the blob. The default text style presets should also include a larger scrolling capitals that is centered, and a message that uses it. There should be an example folder of messages with three parts: 1) Countdown initiated... in typewriter, 2) 3, 2, 1 split on comma with bounce and 1 second per part, 3) large scrolling capitals centered with It's time to party <0001f973>
